steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Verify that the 'Customer Login' section is displayed on the left side of the page
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot' in the username field
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the URL of the account overview page contains '/overview.htm'
Verify that the 'Welcome' message displays the customer name
Verify that the 'Accounts Overview' heading is displayed
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Verify that the right side navigation menu displays the banking options
Verify that the 'Log Out' link is visible in the top navigation
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the invalid username 'invaliduser' in the username field
Enter the invalid password 'invalidpass' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Attempt to navigate to the protected account overview page
Verify that access is denied and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Try to access protected pages without logging in

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Attempt to navigate to the protected account overview page
Verify that access is denied and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Attempt to navigate to the protected open account page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/openaccount.htm'
Verify that access is denied and the user remains on the login page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Complete flow with valid source account

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot' in the username field
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Select the valid source account '29217'
Perform a banking transaction or action
Verify that the transaction is successful and the account balance is updated accordingly (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Enter the valid username 'ficusroot' in the username field
Enter the valid password 'katal@n@ravi' in the password field
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Select the invalid source account '12345'
Attempt to perform a banking transaction or action
Verify that the transaction fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

testName: Edge case: Try to log in with empty fields

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at 'https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm'
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the login fails and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
